group_1.narration: So the next place I visited was the@Sankyoin Academy...
To see the young head of the Kashin-style@flower arrangement school!
That's right! @That's where the great [textRed:Nanaka Tokiwa] is!
She's as beautiful as she is smart!@And she's got great sense too!
My designs may have gone over Ami's@head, but would Tokiwa get them?

group_1.textLeft: Excuse me, Nanaka!@Sorry to bother you! But excuse me.

group_1.textRight: You don't really need to apologize so much. @What can I do for you?

group_1.textLeft: Err, that wasn't really an apology...@But if it sounded like that, I'm sorry!

group_1.textRight: ...What about just now?
Very well then, I should be going.@...Goodbye now.

group_1.textLeft: Err, no, no, please wait!@Can I have just a little of your time?

group_1.textRight: What do you need?

group_1.textLeft: I want you to look at some of the clothing@designs I've sketched!

group_1.textRight: Clothing designs?[chara:300501:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock] Me?

group_1.textLeft: Yes! You have incredible artistic sense!@Please!

group_1.textRight: I'm not sure I'll be of any helpâ€¦
So you just want my opinion?@All right, why not?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, thank you so much!@Here, please take a look!

group_1.textRight: All right, let's see.
Hmmm... Oh, my... Oh, I see...@Oh...how interesting...
Yes, well...hmmm, yes...@I think I get the general idea.
I'm especially intrigued by the one with the@hands coming out of the back...
Mushrooms? Really?[chara:300501:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]
...I'm certain of one thing.
This world isn't quite ready for your@clothing designs.

group_1.textLeft: So you're trying to tell me that they're@out of this world?!

group_1.textRight: Yes, out of this world.@Not really made for earthlings!
Maybe in a hundred years, no, a thousand@years...maybe then people will be ready.
Until then, maybe what you need to do is get@a space ship.
Then you could take all your designs and@blast off into deep space!
I'm sure you'll find some aliens out there@that will surely love them!
I think maybe you should only have enough@fuel for a one-way trip too!

group_1.textLeft: ...You mean to say that this world isn't big@enough for me...!

group_1.textRight: ...Sure!@I love your interpretation!

group_1.narration: And so now I was surer than ever@of the scale of my talent...
But even I never imagined I was already at an@unearthly level of skill...
Then I thought I should show my@designs to a more normal person.
After all, I'm trying to make clothes for all@types of people, not just fashion lovers...
So maybe I can learn something by talking@to regular people!
